sentences: K천ige ilusamad on sellel aasta viimasel n채dalavahetusel.
context: The word 'viimasel' is the adessive case of the Estonian superlative adjective 'viimane', meaning 'last' or 'final'. In this form, it indicates location, time, or relationship with something. It functions as an adverbial modifier that shows when something happened (at the last moment), where something occurred (in the last place), or refers to something being final in a sequence of things.
